intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: All right...the throne room is just upstairs from here.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Understood. Wait. Someone's coming down.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Oh!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Well, well...look who's still alive! You're just full of surprises, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm through playing games, Iago. Let's just do this.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Not so fast! Lady Elise, I'm here for you! Why don't you come over here, and I'll protect you.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Why would I ever listen to YOU! You tried to make Xander and Leo fight Corrin! And you've tried to kill him/her, like, five times already!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Save your breath, Elise. This guy never listens to reason. He doesn't care about right or wrong. He's just looking out for himself. I think it's time we taught him a lesson he'll never forget.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Ooh, such big words. Hoshidan prince/princess! But you are right... I don't care about what's right or wrong. That's why I always get my way. I'm willing to do what's necessary. Like THIS!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: AHHH!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Takumi! What are you doing?

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Die die die die die...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Urk...you're...hurting me! Why...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What's wrong with you? Stop hurting her!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: *sigh* I just knew this would be too much for your feeble mind to understand... And I need you to comprehend the totality of your defeat. Otherwise I can't properly enjoy myself, you see? Very well, let me explain. Prince Takumi has been on our side all along! Thanks to him, I've known your whereabouts every step of the way.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: You're lying. How could that be possible? Takumi, tell me this is a joke!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Bwahaha! How does it feel? Being stabbed in the back again and again? And to think of all that time you spent looking for poor little Takumi...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: There's no way Takumi would betray us of his own free will. He must still be possessed!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Oh, please. Of course he's possessed. But the spell wouldn't work without a kernel of dissatisfaction in his soul. He's always felt like an afterthought in the royal family. He has quite the inferiority complex. He desperately wants to prove himself. That's how he survived. His hatred kept him going so he could deceive you all! Now it's his turn to shine. Mwahahaha! He's deliciously evil, is he not? Better hurry up and kill him... before he kills Azura!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: There's got to be a better way... Takumi, listen! What happened in the Bottomless Canyon? What made you this way?

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Nnngh...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: I can fix this... Just need to sing my song...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Aieeee!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Azura!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Oh, I'm so glad I'm getting to see this all in person for once. It's quite a show! I wonder how it will end...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Takumi...you've got to listen to me.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Are you really just going to let him kill Azura like this? What are you waiting for? Kill Takumi! And then see how Ryoma reacts. Oh ho ho!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I believe in you, Takumi. I know the real you is still in there.

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Nnngh...Brother/Sister...

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Now's my chance... You are the ocean's gray waves... ♪

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: No! Shut up!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Haaah!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Gwaahhh...

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I w-won't let you interrupt her!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Sakura! Thank you!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: You will pay for that bit of sass, young lady. I didn't want to get my hands dirty, but I suppose it can't be avoided.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Eeeee!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Leave her out of this, Iago!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: *cough* *cough* It's OK, everyone... I'm myself again. Thank you, Azura.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Yes! I knew you'd snap out of it!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Thank you for believing in me, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Of course.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: What just happened?

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: I just woke up for good. That's what happened. You were able to exploit some of my deepest fears and flaws, but that's over. My brothers and sisters need me, and I won't let them down. I'm a proud prince of Hoshido, and from now on I will live up to the title!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: How disappointing.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This is it for you, Iago. You're on the wrong side of history. Peace is coming, and you can't stand in its way any longer. WE WILL GRIND YOU TO DUST!

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: You poor fool. Doing Corrin's dirty work for him/her...

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: You're like a rather pesky cockroach, you know that? Just when I think I've got you under my foot, you scamper away.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Sure. Just keep talking. It's what you do best. I'm through talking.

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: Well, then! I'll save the rest of my clever analogies for another time... And kill you right now. HAAH!

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: Yes! I was hoping I'd get a chance to kill you myself. This is for everything you've put me through!

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: *yawn* You know I chose you because you were the weakest, right? You should never have come out of that spell—now you're going to suffer!

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: Wrong! Now that my head is clear, my aim is truer than ever. I'm going to turn your face into my own personal bull's-eye.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You're finished, Iago.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Awk! No...I don't want to die! Please...listen! I was under a spell the whole time. This is all King Garon's fault! I would never have done all those things to you.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Sure.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Won't somebody save me? King Garon is the evil behind all of this. I've been used! Have mercy on me!
Pathetic. I've never seen someone face their own death with less dignity. For that, and for all of your cruelty, you're a disgrace to Nohr!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Leo!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Any last words, Iago?

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Lord Leo! I throw myself upon your mercy. You're here to save me, right?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Weren't you listening just now? I am not your ally, you monster. I won't allow you to sully our kingdom a moment longer!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: B-but, milord...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Just stop talking. I'll put you out of your misery.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Please, I beg you!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Die!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Gyah!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Good riddance.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Leo. Have you come to join us? We're about to confront King Garon.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Not exactly. I have had a moment of enlightenment, and I believe you are on the side of justice. However, I'm still a Nohrian prince, and King Garon is still my father. I won't stop you, but I cannot assist you further.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I understand. Even though I now know we're not related, I still think of you as my brother.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Thank you, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Also, I meant to tell you earlier, but... No, wait. Never mind.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: What? What is it? You can't tease me like that!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: *sigh* Your collar is inside out again.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: DAMN IT. Why didn't you tell me before?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Sorry, I didn't want to interrupt your moment with Iago. You really took charge there!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Well...thank you. I guess.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Don't worry, Leo! You still looked super cool!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Elise! What are you doing here?

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: I'm here to try and talk Xander and Father into listening to Corrin. I can't stand watching our family self-destruct anymore!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: I see. Well, I'm not sure Xander or Father are in the mood for chatting... You should go wait this out in that secret passage Camilla thinks I don't know about.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: You know about that?! Ugh, of course you do. Nothing gets past you. But it doesn't matter. I have to do this! I'm the only one who has a chance of making them drop their guard and listen. I can't just sit by and do nothing while everyone I love tries to kill each other! I couldn't live with myself...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: But, Elise...

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Sorry, my mind's made up.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Well, I suppose I can't make you change your mind. So...do as you wish. But please be careful.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Yay! Thank you, Leo! Your blessing means a lot to me.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Leo.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: You two...so reckless. Since you can't be stopped, I must at least warn you one last time... Xander is stronger than you can fathom. Much stronger than either of us. And Father is perhaps stronger still.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I appreciate the warning. But I am willing to give my life for this cause. And I am confident enough to believe I won't have to.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: You have grown considerably, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Leo. We'll be on our way now. I hope we can meet again.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: See you soon, Leo!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Yes... Good-bye.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: I honestly have no idea how this is all going to turn out... Wait a moment. Was that Odin giggling? And did I hear Niles cough? Guys, why don't you stop hiding and come out here.

end.speaker: Niles
end.line: So sorry, Lord Leo. We simply didn't wish to disturb you unless it became necessary.

end.speaker: Odin
end.line: Yes, but then this insolvent creature tickled my fancy with a mirth-filled quip! Even my dark aura could not resist a chuckle.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: What have I said about referring to your dark aura all the time?

end.speaker: Odin
end.line: But, milord...to even think of you being imprisoned within eternal darkness... Your soul yearning to break free.... Oh, the lamentations I would express...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Huh?

end.speaker: Niles
end.line: He's trying to say that he was worried about you, milord. You went off to the Bottomless Canyon with that strange crystal all alone... I was worried about you, too. That's why we're here.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Yes, well...thank you, I suppose.

end.speaker: Odin
end.line: Tell us, what fantastic truths did the dark crystal reveal to you?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Well...

end.speaker: Niles
end.line: Ooh. That good, huh?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: No, it's just... Father... He's no longer... Ugh. Let's just say, big changes are on the horizon, for all of us. There's going to be a major battle, and anything could happen.

end.speaker: Niles
end.line: Understood, milord.

end.speaker: Odin
end.line: Yes. I have prophesied this from the very beginning...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Heh. You're hopeless, Odin. ... *sigh* Good luck, Corrin...
